description: Decanter is a Tripokalon judge and Pokémon Critic. She was a judge at the Tripokalon in Fujo Town for the Pofflé round. She thought Miette`s Pofflés had such a rich aroma and were wonderful. Decanter was quick to point out that despite Jessie`s Pofflés artistic design, the taste was well received by the Pokémon.
name: Decanter
